name: Sword Wraith Commander
languages: the languages it knew in life

abilities.name: Martial Fury.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

abilities.name: Turning Defiance.
abilities.description: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
